Name: Valerius Eten&Drinken
Review Text:
Beautiful local family owned restaurant. Delicious breakfast / lunch with friendly and fast service. We would highly recommend taking a stroll to this spot for brunch. Lovely area with lots of outdoor seating.
Very fair priced.

Name: Valerius Eten&Drinken
Review Text: Best food we've had in Amsterdam. Prices are really affordable, the personel is great. 5 stars, for sure.

Name: Valerius Eten&Drinken
Review Text:
Best value in the area.
Great food and staff were lovely.

Name: Valerius Eten&Drinken
Review Text: Nice location down some quieter streets, plenty of seating outside to enjoy the authentic views. The atmosphere inside was pleasant, the staff were friendly and the food was fantastic. The breakfast menu had a range of items, from ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Yummy breakfast and great customer service.

Name: Valerius Eten&Drinken
Review Text: Very cozy and well decorated place. The staff was nice and the prices are fine.

Name: Valerius Eten&Drinken
Review Text:
Food tasted good and portions were generous, I tried the scrambled eggs with salmon and the goats cheese salad, would recommend both.
Coffee was average, my almond latte tasted off so I swapped to a soy latte which was better.

Name: Valerius Eten&Drinken
Review Text: This was our favorite breakfast spot during our visit to Amsterdam. Loved the breakfast special, which included coffee, eggs, a croissant, jams and cheeses. A lot of food for a very reasonable price, and kept us full until dinner. It is ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Love the yogurt bowl! Great music too.

Name: Valerius Eten&Drinken
Review Text: Enjoyed the service, food and music. The restaurant is in a quiet area so there's not a lot of people coming by but it was still a great place that I think everyone should come by and see. Great coffee too!
